name: frederick-lopez-portfolio
description: This is Frederick Lopez project portfolio

scripts.build:js: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/progress-bar.js --compress -o dist/js/progress-bar-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/auto-type.js --compress -o dist/js/auto-type-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/nav-pop-out.js --compress -o dist/js/nav-pop-out-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/about-hover.js --compress -o dist/js/about-hover-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/code-snippet.js --compress -o dist/js/code-snippet-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/image-modal.js --compress -o dist/js/image-modal-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/project-hover.js --compress -o dist/js/project-hover-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/project-tab.js --compress -o dist/js/project-tab-min.js && uglifyjs src/js/switch-theme.js --compress -o dist/js/switch-theme-min.js
scripts.copy:pages: cp src/*.html dist && cp src/pages/*.html dist
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run minify-images && npm run build:js && npm run copy:pages

author: Frederick Lopez <frederickpiadolopez@gmail.com>
